#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
 string s;
 int i;
 map<char,int> mp; 
 cin>>s;
 for(i=0;i<s.length();i++){
   mp[s[i]]++;
 }
 if(mp['i'] && mp['l'] && mp['o'] && mp['o']==2 && mp['v'] && mp['e'] && mp['y'] && mp['u'])
     cout<<"happy\n";
 else
    cout<<"sad\n";
 return 0;
}
